name: Hard Words in Words Quiz / Test | Words in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Question: Consumed around a period in time (hint - 6 letters, ventilate).
Answer: Aerate - the letters ATE (consumed) around the letters ERA (period in time).
Sounds easy enough, now it's your turn ...


A heavenly body in wet dirt.
A bee's method of attack about precipitation.
Snake-like sea creature in a European country.
Respiratory organ about a drink flavoured with juniper berries.
Chronological duration is in the middle.
questions.explanation:
Centimetre & Centimeter & Centimetres & Centimeters.

	CEN-time-TRE.  TIME inside CENTRE.

questions.text: Grass-like water plant about chief in size or importance.
Competition of speed within an item of furniture.
Wicked found in a primary colour.
Decomposes about the lair of a wild animal.
questions.explanation:
Rodents & Rodent.

	RO-den-TS.  ROTS around DEN.
